prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a friendly demeanor and soft colors.
Imagine a powerful dragon with large wings and a round body shape.
Design a playful dragon Pokemon that loves to fly over mountains.
Generate a Pokemon that combines dragon features with a gentle personality.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that resembles a dragon in appearance.
Make a Pokemon with orange scales and a white underbelly that can soar high.
I want a unique dragon Pokemon that can adapt to both land and sea.
